decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This consent is valid for a period of two years and does not authorise any works carried out beyond that period.
Reason: In accordance with the Town and Country Planning (Tree Preservation) (England) Regulations 2012.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: TPO 130/1991 - TREES LOCATED OUTSIDE 1-34 SELHURST CLOSE - T1&2 (no TPO) Himalayan Birch (x2) - Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction (2-2.5m off height and 1-1.5m off width). Canopy touching building. T3 (no TPO) Himalayan Birch (x1) - Reduce crown back to previous points of reduction (1.5m off height). Reason: Canopy touching building. T8 (TPO T19) Common Yew (x1) - Reduce width in lower crown by 0.5-1m. Reason: Located in confined space. General maintenance. To maintain tree at smaller size. T9&10 (TPO T18, T12) Wild Cherry (x2) - Reduce heights and widths by 1.5-2m. Reason: Canopy touching building. To maintain the trees at a smaller size. T11 (no TPO) Goat Willow (x1) - Reduce lateral branches by 1-2m. Reason: To allow 1m clearance from building. T14 (TPO T16) Common Lime (x1) - Low branches overhanging road. Crown lift to 5m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size. T15 (TPO T15) Sycamore (x1) - Low branches overhanging road. Crown lift to 5m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size. T17 (TPO T14) Common Holly (x1) - Low branches overhanging road. Crown lift to 5m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size. T18 (TPO T13) Sycamore (x1) - Crown lift to 5m. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size. G23 (no TPO) Cherry Laurel (x1) - Raise low branches overhanging footpath to 2.5m. T25 (TPO T8)  Bay Tree (x1) - Canopy edge touching building. Reduce lateral branches by approximately 1-2m to give 1.5m clearance from building. Reason: General maintenance. To maintain the tree at a smaller size. T26 (no TPO) Aspen (x1) - Reduce height by 3-4m and width by 2-2.5m. T27&28 (no TPO) (x2) - Golden Robinia (x2) - Crown lift to 3m. T29 (no TPO) Gleditsia 'Sunburst' (x1) - Crown lift to 3m. Reason: Suppressed development. T30 (no TPO) Gleditsia 'Sunburst' (x1) - Reduce lateral branches by approximately 1-2m to give 1.5m clearance from building and crown lift
